Chapter 2825: Chapter 1505: 54 Kills From No Solution, One Thought Wisdom Trades For Temporizing_2

Chapter 2825: Chapter 1505: 54 Kills from No Solution, One Thought Wisdom Trades for Temporizing_2

“Hallmaster Dao Qiongcang!”

“Oh, if it’s not possible, it’s not possible. I thought you said it was possible… but I did mention I would be offensive just now, so there’s no need to apologize, right?”

“Get lost!”

…

The snowstorm raged, and the sword energy ran rampant.

“Ancient Sword Steps?”

“Fifty-four Sword Steps?”

Xu Xiaoshou had only just heard Feng Zhongzui briefing the onlookers in front of the Dao Imparting Mirror on the knowledge of “sword technique”.

The traceless transparent sword light had already flashed from an unknown location in the snowstorm, sweeping fiercely over his body.

Boom!

“Attacked, Passive Points +9999.”

Xu Xiaoshou remained unmoved, but the clothes on his chest exploded into pieces.

His body, as cold and luminous as jade emitting a rosy glow, had been slashed in an instant, as if tormented by ten thousand swords—a massive wound dense with numerous minor cuts!

“One sword, breached my defenses?”

Even though the wounds could heal in an instant, Xu Xiaoshou was alarmed.

With each consecutive attack of the Fifty-four Sword Steps being stronger than the last, this initial sword could penetrate the defenses of a holy emperor-level Strengthen…

Xu Xiaoshou did not dare to be negligent, “Perception” bloomed mightily as he searched for Li Fuyu’s whereabouts.

But…

No trace!

She seemed to also know the Vanishing Technique, leaving no trace in this world after striking with a sword.

“Merging with the Way of the Heavens?”

“Merging with the Way of the Sword?”

“Merging with the Way of Nothingness?”

Xu Xiaoshou’s mind flashed with many possibilities, trying and verifying each one, but he still couldn’t find any trace of Li Fuyu among these various paths and methods.

Swish! Swish!

Once again, the traceless sword light swept out, this time piercing from both west and east directions simultaneously.

Boom! Boom!

“Attacked, Passive Points +9999.”

“Attacked, Passive Points +9999.”

Xu Xiaoshou’s body trembled, he did not move, yet the flesh on his chest turned hazy with blood—this second strike could harm the meridians, and its power surged considerably!

Xu Xiaoshou’s back chilled, he dared not take it lightly, and drew the Flame Python, slashing with his sword.

“Falling Flower World!”

In the midst of the snowstorm, Red Plum petals fluttered down.

He attempted to find the Formless Li Fuyu with the Swordless Sword Technique by switching between the illusion and reality, nothingness and existence.

——Still no trace!

Moved in his heart, Xu Xiaoshou who had “Perception” bloom grandly, could detect faint fluctuating traces of existence and nothingness in the void for a split second…

Was Li Fuyu transitioning from non-existence to existence at the same moment he turned into nothingness?

Or rather, did she slice out from “nothingness” that could possibly be a form of consciousness, entering another state of “nothingness” unknown to him?

“Blocked my vision?” Xu Xiaoshou grew angry.

This was not just Sword Steps but an advanced Shadow Concealing Step.

She was clearly right by his side, yet blocking his line of sight, vanishing from existence from an alternative angle of “Path” and “Nothingness”…

Swish! Swish! Swish!

Before he could think further, the traceless sword light again advanced upon him.

This time, converging from above, below left, and below right simultaneously, as if there were three Li Fuyus attacking… no, launching a covert attack!

Xu Xiaoshou could not find her, but he could catch the rhythm of the attacks, predicting his strikes:

“Way of Nothingness, Swordless Sword Form.”

“Mo’s Way, Green River Sword Borderline.”

The two swords burst forth nearly at the same time, melding together, forming a domain of sword light similar to the Close-bounds Force Field.

“No Sword Realm!”

He drew a sword straight in front of his chest.

Xu Xiaoshou’s form faded along with the sword.

At the same time, around his body, the Mo Sword appeared out of nowhere, then transformed into void, turning into countless entities resembling the Glow of Sharpness, madly interweaving to protect a space of one zhang around him.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

Blood blossomed before his legs.

Then, a large chunk of flesh and blood flew from his chest, this time reaching as deep as his ribs and heart.

“Attacked, Passive Points +9999.”

“Attacked, Passive Points +9999.”

“Attacked, Passive Points +9999.”

He had parried nothing…

Xu Xiaoshou’s sword parried air, and even his complexion shook.

Just by the lack of touch, just by that feeling of not having made contact with anything, he knew the defense of the No Sword Realm around him had failed.

Li Fuyu’s third strike of the Sword Steps disregarded the No Sword Realm!

Was she in another, higher plane of “Nothingness”?

What was this “Nothing”?

“Received Concern, Passive Points +2.”

“Received Understanding, Passive Points +1.”

Feng Zhongzui clutched the Dao Imparting Mirror, staring intently at the Arena, so focused that he didn’t notice even when the mirror tilted, he just screamed:

“The first strike, the second strike…”

“It’s the Fourth Sword! It can’t be blocked, it simply can’t be blocked!”

“Li Fuyu’s Ancient Sword Steps, Lord Shou has never seen them before. In fact, not just him, I haven’t seen them either, and let me show you their expressions… they haven’t seen them either!”

The Dao Imparting Mirror straightened, and below it, a smaller view appeared, showing old Sword Immortals such as Mei Siren and Feng Tingchen.

Without exception, each of them wore a look of astonishment.

Even Mei Siren had stopped moving the fan in his hands, staring intently at the Arena and those traceless sword lights, trying to decipher something…

Boom boom boom boom!

Xu Xiaoshou’s front and back, arms and ribs were all ripped open, the wounds so deep that bones were visible.

This time, he employed the Fantasy Sword Technique, leaving behind an illusion, while his true body used the Time-space Transition, vanishing into nothingness for a moment.

There was no Vanishing Technique, no Independence.

The Ancient Sword Technique encompassed a myriad of defenses, capable of impersonating invincibility, right?

The result…

Completely ineffective!

Li Fuyu saw through it as if it were crystal clear.

Such tricks and the Fantasy Sword Technique were child’s play before her, and the Time-space Transition had mistimed the rhythm.

With the Fifty-four Sword Steps, Li Fuyu could slow down a bit, waiting for Xu Xiaoshou’s Time-space Transition to revert to reality… then strike again!

“Can’t figure it out!”

Feng Zhongzui, seeing Master Siren’s solemn expression, knew everything:
